description: This file defines the NotesListScreen widget for a Flutter application. It manages displaying a list of notes, handles navigation to note editing and details screens, and supports responsive layout. It also includes UI components such as an empty state and note cards.

classes.name: NotesListScreen
classes.description: A StatefulWidget that displays a list of notes, manages initialization, and handles navigation to note creation and detail screens.

classes.name: _NotesListScreenState
classes.description: State class for NotesListScreen, manages UI state, performs initialization, and builds the widget tree including responsive layouts and navigation.

methods.name: didChangeDependencies
methods.description: Overrides to trigger provider initialization once dependencies change.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree, including AppBar, FloatingActionButton, and list of notes or empty state depending on provider state.

methods.name: _smoothRoute
methods.description: Creates a page route with fade transition for navigation.
